title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Classification of mine waste: water, rock/ soil. Factors of vegetation growth in disturbed soil and species selection. Water and wind led soil erosion: estimation, control and engineering practices. Vegetated water ways and terraces: functions, types, design. Land forming: Grading and Landscaping methods. Slope and ground stabilization and monitoring methods. Corporate Social Responsibility , public involvement in industrial development ,community development, closure, economic regeneration and regional community sustainability.
